attributes.action: Prevent Gordon Brown from creating an Unfair price gap in Road tax and introduce wider time of  co emissions related road tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If you are like me and have an older car which is over 2 litre and resonably economical BUT can't afford to change to a more modern small car! 
    Why should we be taxed at twice the ordianary road fund licence rate?  
    I don't damage the road any more than any other vehicle!
   If emissions are the prime concern then we should be allowed to subject our cars for emissions testing for cheaper tax if it doesn't pollute!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
